text: Pavel Grigoryevich Kotov (; born 21 June 1995) is a Russian professional football player. He plays for FC Veles Moscow. ==Club career== He made his professional debut on 24 September 2014 for PFC CSKA Moscow in a Russian Cup game against FC Khimik Dzerzhinsk. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:People from Dedovsk Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:PFC CSKA Moscow players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Lithuania Category:Russian expatriate sportspeople in Lithuania Category:FC Stumbras players Category:A Lyga players Category:FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk players
title: Pavel Kotov
